updates.text: [NSL] CLEARED: Train services between #Woodlands and #YewTee are now running normally. Free bus and bus bridging services have ceased.
[NSL] UPDATE: Train services between #Woodlands and #YewTee is expected to be resumed at 02:10pm.
We're alerted of a traction power loss betw Kranji and Yew Tee at 12:30pm. SMRT engineers deploy on track to investigate n rectify situation
[NSL]: No train service between #YewTee and #Woodlands in both directions due to power fault.  Free bus service are available.
[NSL]:  Train services between #Kranji and #YewTee will be delayed for 20 minutes due to a traction power fault.
